text: Balduina atropurpurea (purpledisk honeycombhead) is a North American species of plants in the sunflower family. It is native to the southeastern United States (Florida, Georgia, Alabama, South Carolina, North Carolina).Biota of North America Program 2014 county distribution map Balduina atropurpurea is a perennial herb with branching stems. Each plant has 1-4 flower heads, each with yellow ray florets and purple disc florets. The species grows in pinelands and savannahs.Flora of North America, Balduina atropurpurea R.M. title: Balduina atropurpurea
